channel.title: Webinars on Sanchit's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Webinars on Sanchit's blog

item.title: Apache Airflow - from Zero to Hero
item.description: Apache Airflow - from Zero to Hero Overview In this webinar, we’ll discuss the factors to consider, the difficulties to overcome while running a custom Orchestration tool at scale, and how Apache Airflow comes to the rescue. To begin, let’s discuss what it means to run Airflow at a large scale. The constructs of the Airflow architecture, Scheduler procedures, and configuration options will then be thoroughly discussed. After that, we’ll discuss how Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA) helps simplify the complexity of open-source Apache Airflow and the additional security features it offers.

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2022 - Reinvent your business with an AWS modern data strategy
item.description: AWS re:Invent 2022 - Reinvent your business with an AWS modern data strategy (PEX308) Overview AWS can help organizations quickly get answers from data by providing mature and integrated analytics services ranging from cloud data warehouses to serverless data lakes. Join this session to learn about AWS modern data architecture and how AWS analytics services can help your customers navigate data challenges, optimize analytics processes, and deliver insights to their businesses faster.

item.title: Let's explore Apache Kafka, the Easy Way on AWS!
item.description: Let’s explore Apache Kafka, the Easy Way on AWS! Overview Apache Kafka is powerful. But “with great power, comes great responsibility”! Fortunately, with Amazon MSK, developers can focus on how to build with Kafka instead of being responsible for managing a large-scale distributed system. This session will provide an overview of Amazon MSK (including its Serverless flavor) and MSK Connect. It will cover architecture along with hands-on demos to give you a better understanding of how to leverage Kafka on AWS to build practical solutions for everyday use cases.

item.title: Let's Code AWS CDK
item.description: Let’s Code AWS CDK Overview “Let’s Code AWS CDK” which is The AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK), an open-source software development framework to define your cloud application resources using familiar programming languages. We will cover the Flavors of CDK Construct, Creating CDK Project in Python, and Step-by-Step Deployment CDK project. It is hosted by AWS UserGroup Mumbai to spread the knowledge of AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) Speakers.

item.title: AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation
item.description: AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation Overview Organisations are breaking down data silos and building petabyte-scale data lakes on AWS to democratise access to thousands of end users. Since its launch, AWS Lake Formation has accelerated data lake adoption by making it easy to build and secure data lakes. In this session, we explore data lake challenges and how AWS Lake Formation can help you.

item.title: Serverless, No server, Really?
item.description: Serverless, No server, Really? Overview AWS User Group Nashik-Mumbai-Pune is excited to announce our finale session as part of Serverless, No server, Really? series. This session will explore other lesser-known serverless services that can help leverage the true power of serverless like Fargate, the difference between EC2 Fargate and Lambda, an overview of SAM, AWS Step Functions, AWS AppSync, Amazon EventBridge, Aurora Serverless, RDS Proxy, and much more. Speakers. Aishwarya Gupta - Senior Cloud Engineer, Quantiphi Jones Zachariah Noel N - AWS Serverless Hero & Sr.

item.title: Getting Started with DevOps on AWS
item.description: Getting Started with DevOps on AWS Overview Getting Started with DevOps on AWS is a two part session for exploring different AWS services related to DevOps. It is hosted by AWS UserGroup Nashik to spread & aware the knowledge of DevOps. And it covers different AWS services like AWS CloudFormation AWS CodeCommit, CodePipeline, CodeDeploy Monitoring services - AWS CloudWatch Demo: To host static website on S3 using AWS CI/CD Demo: To deploy a LAMP stack using AWS CI/CD

item.title: Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew
item.description: Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew Overview We all are fascinated with various analytical outcomes like different kinds of visualization. But do we know that 50% of the time is just spent cleansing, understanding, & exploring your data? Also, it is a combustion process, multiple iterations, time-consuming, etc.? AWS launched the Glue DataBrew service to focus more on the business use-case and simplify the preparation activities. This session will focus on the Introduction of the Databrew service, different functionality, followed by a quick demo

item.title: Overview of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse
item.description: Overview of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse Overview Amazon Redshift uses SQL to analyze structured and semi-structured data across data warehouses, operational databases, and data lakes, using AWS-designed hardware and machine learning to deliver the best price performance at any scale. This session will provide an overview of Amazon Redshift like overview, architecture, distribution keys and sort keys, Redshift spectrum, Advance feature, etc. It is hosted by AWS UserGroup Mumbai to spread the knowledge of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse

item.title: AWS SAA-C02 Certification Bootcamp
item.description: WALKTHROUGH OF THE WELL-ARCHITECTED TOOL Introduction Top-rated certifications are a crucial factor to help you stand out in the crowded IT landscape, and with constant certification buzz on LinkedIn and other platforms, the AWS User Groups across multiple cities in India are collaborating to bring you the AWS Solution Architect Associate Training Bootcamp. It is an initiative to promote and provide a forum for interested people to join and prepare for this certification to excel in their professional careers.
